name: Scary Pranks: The Horror Creed
description:
Face your deepest fears! When you're alone at night in a room, at a birthday party or relaxing in a dark forest. Look for clues and activate scary situations while the character doesn’t see it. Run special endings to complete the levels 100%. Get ready for a real nightmare!
You get:
+ cool locations filled with fear and horror
+ characters that believably react to what is happening
+ first person view mode at the end of each level
+ music and sounds that best suit the atmosphere
+ the whole range of emotions - from surprise to horror!
